评论概述: Too long for untucked, casual look!
评论详情: Was excited to see some of the model wearing  the shirt untucked, however, when I received mine and tried it on, I was disappointed to see how long it actually was. Shirt is more designed to be tucked in.

The sizing chart picture’s numbers don’t make sense. I understand you want it to be a bit loose but there’s no way to have a 110 cm waist and 116 cm chest for a medium size. That means I need to be overweight with 8 fingers of space between my waist and the chart’s waist. And for the chest I either need to have some seriously built pecks, or, I’m gonna need to get some breast implants…  TLDR; Your size chart puts me off and makes me not trust any clothing article you’re selling. As others have said, there’s a reason why the prices are so low (AND on a discount).
